amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of the amendment contained in House Report 109-49 and numbered 1 which is printed on pages H2321-H2324 in the Congressional Record for April 20, 2005.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 109-49 to make various technical and conforming changes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hall amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
